statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); printf "\033[1;34m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$cwd")"; if cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'HEAD'); printf " \033[32m%s\033[0m" "$branch"; status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then printf " \033[36m●\033[0m"; fi; fi; printf " \033[35m❯\033[0m %s" "$model"
